title: Density of gas samples pressure and molecular mass

content.description: Three different gas samples that have the same number of molecules and are at room temperature are kept at different pressures. A lab technician has determined the molecular mass of each gas and recorded the pressure and molecular mass of each sample in the table below.
content.question: Which of the following ranks the density Ï of the gas samples?

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
